properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 3:41AM EST until February 19 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt. Seas 3 to
5 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-
North Carolina border out to 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM EST WEDNESDAY
